metadata.title: Bright Ears - Premium Entertainment Booking Platform
metadata.description: Book DJs, bands, singers, and live entertainment for your events in Thailand. Commission-free platform with verified artists.

qr.scanInstructions: Scan this QR code with your Thai banking app

instructions.step1: Open your Thai banking app (Bangkok Bank, SCB, Kasikorn, etc.)
instructions.step6: Take a screenshot of your payment confirmation and upload below

notFound.title: This Beat Dropped Off the Map

noResults.title: No artists found
noResults.description: Try adjusting your filters or search terms to find the perfect entertainer.

noBookings.title: You haven't booked any entertainment yet

noReviews.title: No reviews yet
noReviews.description: Be the first to share your experience and help others make informed decisions.

noFavorites.title: You haven't saved any favorites yet

noMessages.title: Your inbox is empty
noMessages.description: Start a conversation with artists to discuss your event needs and get quotes.

noEvents.title: No upcoming events

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: We're having trouble loading this content. Please try again.

hero.title: Premium Entertainment for Every Event
hero.subtitle: Book DJs, Bands, and Live Entertainment with Confidence
hero.searchPlaceholder: What kind of entertainment do you need?

noCommission.title: No Commission Fees
noCommission.description: Connect directly with artists. We don't take a cut from bookings.

verified.title: Verified Professionals
verified.description: All artists are verified and reviewed by real clients.

secure.title: Secure Bookings
secure.description: Protected bookings with contracts and payment tracking.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Get help whenever you need it, in English or Thai.

common.footer: This email was sent by Bright Ears, Thailand's premier entertainment booking platform.
common.unsubscribe: If you no longer wish to receive these emails, please

bookingInquiry.title: New Booking Inquiry
bookingInquiry.subtitle: You have received a new booking inquiry
bookingInquiry.cta: View and respond to this inquiry by logging into your dashboard.
bookingInquiry.footer: Please respond to this inquiry as soon as possible to maintain a good response time rating.

quoteReceived.title: Quote Received
quoteReceived.subtitle: You have received a quote for your event
quoteReceived.cta: Review the full quote details and accept or negotiate with the artist.
quoteReceived.urgency: This quote expires on {validUntil}. Please respond soon to secure your booking.
quoteReceived.footer: Questions? Reply to this email or contact the artist directly through our platform.

paymentConfirmation.title: Payment Confirmed
paymentConfirmation.subtitle: Your payment has been confirmed
paymentConfirmation.cta: You can view your complete booking details and communicate with your artist using the link below.
paymentConfirmation.footer: Thank you for choosing Bright Ears! We look forward to making your event memorable.

eventReminder.title: Event Reminder
eventReminder.subtitle: Your event is coming up soon
eventReminder.cta: View complete booking details and communicate with your
eventReminder.contact: If you need to contact them, please use the platform messaging or call them directly.
eventReminder.footer: We hope you have a wonderful event! Please don't hesitate to contact our support team if you need any assistance.

bookingCompleted.title: Booking Completed
bookingCompleted.subtitle: Your event has been completed
bookingCompleted.review: We'd love to hear about your experience! Please consider leaving a review.
bookingCompleted.earnings: Your earnings from this booking have been credited to your account.
bookingCompleted.futureText: Keep your availability updated to receive more booking opportunities.
bookingCompleted.futureCustomerText: Browse our platform for your next event - we have amazing artists ready to make your events memorable.
bookingCompleted.footer: Thank you for being part of the Bright Ears community!

instructions.title: How to Pay:
instructions.step1: Open your Thai banking app (Bangkok Bank, SCB, Kasikorn, etc.)
instructions.step2: Scan the QR code with the app

payment.noteText: Please upload your payment slip below after making the payment

uploadSlip.title: Upload Payment Confirmation
uploadSlip.description: Upload a screenshot or photo of your payment confirmation slip
uploadSlip.successDescription: We'll verify your payment and activate your profile within 24 hours

publish.title: Ready to Go Live!
publish.description: Your profile is complete and ready to publish. Once you click the button below, your profile will be visible to clients on Bright Ears.
publish.uploadSlipFirst: Please upload your payment slip first
publish.error: Failed to publish profile. Please try again.
publish.note: You can update your profile anytime from your dashboard

step1.title: Profile Goes Live
step1.description: Your profile becomes visible to clients immediately

step2.title: Payment Verification (24-48 hours)
step2.description: Our team verifies your payment slip and processes your verification

step3.title: Verified Badge Added
step3.description: Once approved, your verified badge is displayed and you get priority visibility

customer.title: Book Entertainment
customer.description: Find and book talented DJs, bands, singers, and performers for your events
customer.feature2: Get instant quotes with no commission fees

artist.description: Showcase your talent and get booked for events with zero commission
artist.feature1: Create your professional profile for free
artist.feature2: Set your own rates, keep 100% of earnings

artists.title: Browse 500+ Verified Artists
artists.subtitle: Find the perfect DJ, band, or entertainer for your event in Thailand

artists.tryAdjustingFilters: Try adjusting your filters or search terms to find more artists

searchTips.title: Search Tips
searchTips.tip1: Try searching for a specific genre like 'Jazz' or 'Rock'
searchTips.tip2: Browse by category using the filters on the left
searchTips.tip3: Filter by location to find artists in your area
searchTips.tip4: Use the price range filter to match your budget
searchTips.tip5: Check verification levels for trusted professionals
